Uses of Class
org.apache.drill.exec.vector.accessor.reader.AbstractScalarReader

Packages that use AbstractScalarReader
Package
Description
org.apache.drill.exec.vector.accessor
Provides a light-weight, simplified set of column readers and writers that can be plugged into a variety of row-level readers and writers.
org.apache.drill.exec.vector.accessor.reader
Provides the reader hierarchy as explained in the API package.
